attributes.action: Ensure the lowering costs to use public transport,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The costs for the average person to use the Trains, Busses and Underground systems is riseing abouve the rate of inflation.  If the government was us to be greener surley the cost of useing public transport has to be reduced to a level where it is 1) cheaper that travling by car, 2) not a horible experience

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
